tweets.content:
I'm particularly excited about what this campaign with @Sidekick_Labs entails because of a few things:

1. streamers, on top of the tipping income during the live sessions, can now unlock more perks from other projects and partners of Sidekick. It unveils a new business model for both the streamers and Sidekick. We are fast-tracked from Yap-to-earn to Live-to-Earn - LiveFi, so to speak. It will create a flywheel and build a stronger network effect for Sidekick as a global distributor. 

2. watchers of the streams, can now take a more active creator role to generate stream video clips, and start earning from the token trading fee of their user-generated clips. It's as simple as cropping clips, posting on X with their own words, and tokenize these posts into trends. If a clip X post gets viral, likely the trading volume will, too. This is the "rise of readers" - authors are creators, whilst audiences are creators too. 

up to date there are a lot of clip artists for the popular streams on pump, and these clips help amplify the original stream token. While these clip artists get paid if the stream token they shill goes up, it seems almost natural that these clips should be traded. These UGC content creators should be rewarded as much as the original streamers. 

when one or some of these tokenized clips become viral, the CA will surely be picked up by the streamers and talked about during the livestream session again. There has never been a better way to inspire more content from the UGC.  

it is an exciting content distribution experiment and campaign that Trends is running with Sidekick. Don't sideline and jump into the trend. 

Trend is ready, trend is good.
tweets.author: Sidekick_Labs

tweets.content:
@Sidekick_Labs x @Trendsdotfun TPS CampaignğŸ“¢

We are excited to partner with Trends on Trends Points (TPS) Season 1 as an important milestone in LiveFi! The campaign runs between August 11 2pm UTC and August 22 2pm UTC.
Our community members can earn TPS perks in the following ways:

ğŸ‘‰ Stream about Trends on Sidekick

Go live under the â€œTrendsâ€ tag and talk about Trends for at least 10 minutes in one session. This will make you eligible for Trends Points (TPS)! Since these streams require extra review, TPS might not appear instantly. Thank you in advance for your patience.

ğŸ‘‰ Turn your X posts with the keyword â€œSidekick x Trendsâ€ into tokenized moments

Post on X with the keyword â€œSidekick x Trendsâ€ and tokenize it on Trends. To participate in this category, we highly recommend (not a requirement) that you crop video clips from any of your favorite Sidekick streams and share them on X with the keyword before tokenizing. We would love the campaign to be inclusive of the whole Sidekick community, so creating stream clips is the best way to involve UGC efforts and spread the impact of your favorite streamer further!

Sidekick is here to unlock the future potential of the creator economy and global content distribution. We are still early, and trend is good!ğŸ”¥
